snippet: The officer, Larry Jackson, ended up in handcuffs and was detained after a melee at his home in 2010.
abstract: Lawyer for New York City Police Officer Larry Jackson says he has been awarded in excess of $15 million as result of suit filed against city in wake of beating he suffered at hands of 12 other officers in his home in 2010.
lead_paragraph: The officer, Larry Jackson, ended up in handcuffs and was detained after a melee at his home in 2010.

headline.main: Queens Officer Who Sued Police Over Beating Is Awarded $15 Million
headline.print_headline: Police to Pay $15 Million Over Beating of an Officer

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Jackson, Larry (New York, NY, Police Officer)
